channel.title: PlatinumPvP.Beastnode.Net - [1.5.2] ♦[Hardcore PVP]♦ ✯[
channel.description:
Friendly Staff
-Multiple PVP arenas in different Biomes ( TONS OF FUN)
-Cop plugin being worked on jail in progress
-Great Economy!
-Nice spawn
-No lag
-parkour course (hard but fun at same time)
-tons of unique players
-lots to do!
-come make a faction with your friends and rule server
-Friendly staff and people
-Player owned shops and sewer drug shops bought with ingame $!
-Rank up with In game Money to Buy different ranks (perks coming soon)
-Battle at the famous PVP arena
- Come take a look at the Under Water City
-Decent Economy ( Inflated sell stuff for more, buy stuff for more)
-Raiding is allowed but rules will be enforced and followed
-Xrayers will be punished
